channel.title: Adding Categorical Filters to the Movie Site :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Let’s add some filters to the page as well. We’ll start with categorical filters, i.e. filtering by category. Let’s start by filtering for MPAA Rating. We know that there are only a handful of ratings issued by the Motion Picture Association of America - G, PG, PG-13, R, and NC-17. We might be tempted to use an enumeration to represent these values, but in C# an enumeration cannot have strings for values.
